title: Red Tornado: Family Reunion
description: This miniseries shines a new light on the true origin of Red Tornado, the Justice League of America's resident android Super Hero! You'll not only discover a crew of characters new to the DC Universe, if Red Tornado has his way, you'll also uncover the hero's true android family! But will it cost him the love of his adopted human one?Featuring the debuts of Red Tornado's long lost -- and potentially deadly -- siblings, Red Inferno, Red Volcano and Red Torpedo.
author: Kevin VanHook
